articles.title: MOCKING-BIRD-Guitar-Strap
articles.description: ★ Plain white board, Clean Rosewood bridge Shiny back
articles.details: PERFECT BUILT & SOUND - Built of Lightweight High Quality Zinc Alloy. Strong, padded, spring-action grip. Tight on strings and no more fret buzz with this high performance capo.  DESIGNED FOR - It Fits Perfectly on Electric and Acoustic Guitars, Ukulele, Banjo, Bass, Folk Guitars and Mandolin  EASY TO MOVE & USE - Super Fast to Change Between Frets. Quickly and Easily Releases and Repositions With One Hand Without Disturbing Tuning
